name: PIA Flight Academy
about: PIA Flight Academy, located in Karachi, Pakistan, is a premier aviation school offering a comprehensive range of training courses. Established in August 2011, the academy provides a professional environment for students to acquire both technical and flying knowledge. With a minimum education qualification of Intermediate/FSc/A-Levels and an age requirement of 18 years, students are guided by a skilled and dedicated staff. The academy's mission is to equip students with the skills necessary to excel in the aviation industry, ensuring they are well-prepared for a successful career in flying. PIA Flight Academy is committed to delivering high-quality training, making it an ideal choice for those aspiring to become professional pilots.
